title: Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer who is comfortable with both front-end and back-end development.
responsibilities: Design and develop high-quality web applications
Work with product team to understand requirements
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
requirements: 3+ years of experience with JavaScript, React, and Node.js
Strong understanding of database design
Experience with RESTful APIs

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our AI team to develop cutting-edge machine learning solutions for our clients.
responsibilities: Design and implement ML models
Work with large datasets
Present findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders
requirements: Advanced degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch
Strong knowledge of data visualization tools

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: We are seeking a Digital Marketing Specialist to join our growing team in Lyon.
responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns
Manage social media presence
Analyze campaign performance and optimize strategies
requirements: 2+ years of experience in digital marketing
Proficiency in SEO, SEM, and social media marketing
Excellent analytical skills

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our team building next-generation digital marketing solutions.
responsibilities: Develop responsive user interfaces
Collaborate with UX designers
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React
Strong HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills
Experience with modern frontend tools and libraries

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our infrastructure team to build and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure.
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure on AWS
Implement security best practices
requirements: Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins
Strong Linux administration skills
Knowledge of infrastructure as code tools like Terraform

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We're looking for a talented UI/UX Designer to create compelling user experiences for our products.
responsibilities: Design user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications
Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups
Collaborate with developers to implement designs
requirements: 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design
Proficiency with Figma, Adobe XD, or similar tools
Portfolio demonstrating strong design skills

title: Mobile Application Developer
description: Develop innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android using cross-platform technologies.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications using Flutter
Implement responsive and appealing user interfaces
Integrate with backend services and APIs
requirements: 2+ years of experience with Flutter and Dart
Understanding of mobile development lifecycle
Experience with state management solutions

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our team to build robust and scalable backend systems for our financial services platform.
responsibilities: Design and implement server-side logic and APIs
Optimize database queries for performance
Ensure security and compliance of our systems
requirements: 4+ years of experience in backend development
Strong knowledge of Java or similar languages
Experience with relational databases and ORM frameworks

title: QA Engineer
description: We're seeking a detail-oriented QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our educational platform.
responsibilities: Develop and execute test plans and cases
Perform manual and automated testing
Report and track bugs to resolution
requirements: 2+ years of experience in software testing
Knowledge of testing methodologies and best practices
Experience with test automation frameworks

title: Data Engineer
description: Help us build and maintain the data infrastructure powering our renewable energy analytics platform.
responsibilities: Design and implement data pipelines
Work with big data technologies
Ensure data quality and availability
requirements: 3+ years of experience with data engineering
Proficiency with Python and SQL
Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies

title: Product Manager
description: Lead the development and success of our retail technology products.
responsibilities: Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams
Analyze market trends and user feedback to drive product improvements
requirements: 4+ years of experience in product management
Strong understanding of Agile methodologies
Excellent communication and leadership skills

title: IoT Developer
description: Develop innovative Internet of Things solutions for industrial applications.
responsibilities: Design and develop embedded software for IoT devices
Implement communication protocols and data processing
Collaborate with hardware engineers to integrate solutions
requirements: 3+ years of experience in IoT development
Knowledge of embedded systems programming
Experience with wireless communication protocols

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Design and implement robust cloud architecture solutions for our travel technology platform.
responsibilities: Design scalable and secure cloud infrastructure
Provide technical guidance to development teams
Optimize cloud resources for cost and performance
requirements: 5+ years of experience in cloud architecture
AWS, Azure, or GCP certifications
Experience with infrastructure as code

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop machine learning solutions for agricultural technology applications.
responsibilities: Design and implement machine learning models
Process and analyze large datasets
Deploy models to production environments
requirements: 4+ years of experience in machine learning
Strong Python skills and knowledge of ML frameworks
Experience with computer vision or NLP is a plus

title: Fullstack .NET Developer
description: Join our media technology team to develop robust and scalable web applications.
responsibilities: Develop both frontend and backend components
Design and implement database schemas
Ensure application performance and security
requirements: 3+ years of experience with .NET Core
Proficiency with C# and SQL Server
Knowledge of modern JavaScript frameworks
